title: Sound On: Governor Ratings, Trump McConnell Threats
itunes:title: Sound On: Governor Ratings, Trump McConnell Threats
description:
Joe spoke with Jessica Taylor, Senate and Governors Editor for The Cook Political Report on the midterms and her latest rating for gubernatorial races, Bloomberg Supreme Court reporter Greg Stohr on the start of the Supreme Court's new term. Plus, Bloomberg Politics Contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino & Rick Davis on the Texas governors race, the lack of campaign funding for MAGA candidates, and Donald Trump's Michigan rally and threats against Mitch McConnell. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
